price: (9) O Moses, indeed it is I - Allāh, the Exalted in Might, the Wise."
arabic: يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَنَا ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: yāmūsā innahu anā al-lahu al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
